main event: A witness reported seeing a saucer-shaped UFO near Brazil, Indiana on March 6, 1966.
interesting points: The witness described the object as two saucer-shaped parts inverted on top of each other, with no sound except the noise of a paper cup.
The object disappeared by speeding up and vanishing, indicating it could not have been a conventional aircraft.
The witness estimated the object's speed at 10,200 mph and its distance at about 2,000 ft.
The witness had previously seen a similar object near their home in 1962.
The witness reported the sighting to the FAA in Indianapolis in February 1966.
